title: Key Drops? What Are Those?
body: Been playing league for quite a while and i have 5 chests waiting for me to open but i rarely have seen any key fragment drops in about a week or so. I understand that they drop randomly but its been a while since ive gotten a key fragment. I know the drop rates are probably low but how are u goin to have chest but not have keys to open them. It makes me feel bad because i was hyped about the whole hextech feature but i can't even enjoy it because i cant even open up a chest. Ps im broke as hell and cant afford rp....

replies.body: It felt like the first 8 key fragments were easy to get.  Got them on day 1 or 2.  Then I got 4 more over the next week or so.  And then I've never seen any more keys since.  It seems like you can only get 12.  I'm starting to wonder when I'll ever be able to get any more.
I got 2 then it took me a week to get another fragment...

Since the start of Live Hextech Crafting:

5 chests, 4 KEY FRAGMENTS.

Can we PLEASE get a buff to the fragment drops?

That's some bad luck... :|  

6 Chests, 11 Key Fragments here... I'm not sure if fragments need to drop more, because I know it'll take me a while to get more chests (already played most of my best champs). So the keys will catch up eventually.

for me its the opposite got keys just no chests :S they just wont drop

i cant figure this hextech system out how do i get chests
When you or someone you queue with gets an S-, S, or S+

you need an S rank And a win also I believe.

I have gotten S's on defeats but that still won't yield you a chest
I got an S- on poppy and lost the game and still got a chest. Also, its any variation of the S rank. - + and ♮.
when I say S rank I mean any variation of S

You don't need to win in order to get a chest, as long as you get an S rank. Granted S ranks are rather hard to get when you're on the losing team, but I've managed it before and received a chest.

Strange that you didn't, but perhaps you had no free chest slots/had already got an S rank chest for that champion when it happened for you?
ahh you are right, you just need to win to get key fragments

You have to get an S, S-, Or S+ in order to get a chest.

You can do this by getting a lot of kills with few deaths, a lot of assists, good cs, ect...\

(PS: {{champion:80}} is a free crate basically lol)

There is a cd on when you can get chests. It will tell you on your profile when the next time is that you can get a box. Also you can only get them when you get S rank, and only once on each champion(per season I think)
The keys are where they get ya.

I haven't gotten a key frag in at least two weeks, and I frequently play with five stacks.

Shit sucks.

Well, seeing as the hextech system is a free method of getting skins and stuff, I'd imagine it'd be difficult/awkward to get some aspect of it, it is gonna be a rare occurrence, since literally all of the money Rito makes is from out of game purchases. Honestly I'd guess the hextech crafting was introduced to incentivize spending more money, so either chests or keys have to be kinda rare. It also makes sense for keys to be the rarer one, as they cost less, therefore making it a bit more likely for someone to be willing to buy them.
Yes but fragment drops are extremely rare and it takes 3 of those just to open 1 chest.
That's my point; they're rare to make people more inclined to buy stuff...
You can't get key fragments if you have no chests available.

That's actually not true, i have no chests left and yet i just got a key fragment 15 minutes ago.

Took me 32 wins tho, which kinda sucks
Actually me and all of my friends haven't taken a single key fragment when they don't have a chest avaiable... When I have, I get 1 key every 2 wins.
